[[Might Guy]], using his great talent with [[taijutsu]], concentrates all his skill into a spinning backwards kick. The kick is so fast that it cannot be seen, much less dodged, and it is delivered with such power that targets are unlikely to get up once they're struck, much less block.<ref name="d2"/> In the anime, this technique generates a powerful whirlwind around the user, which can be used to attack multiple opponents at once.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 288</ref>

== Trivia ==
* When written on its own, {{translation|"剛力"||gōriki|lit meaning=hard strength}} is a term used to describe "herculean strength", often associated with mountain-carriers.
* In the anime, [[Rock Lee]] uses this technique in his [[Infinite Tsukuyomi]] dream.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 451</ref>
